title: Forcing Step Attachment
intro: An individual Step can be set as required to force users to respond to it prior to moving on. Similarly, a Template can be built to force users to attach some more information to a Step. This can take the form of rich content such as a picture, a voice/text memo or even a video. Regardless of the type of Step, there might be cases where you would like an operator to take a picture upon reassembly of a machine. Forcing a Step attachment will enforce this, in just a single click.

blocks.content: In the editor, each Step presents a set of four icons. Each icon represent a type of media that you would require the user to attach to a given Step.
To enable a particular media, simply click on it. In this case, a picture would have to be attached to this question in order to be able to move on.

blocks.caption: A user running a workflow with a required attachment, will be reminded in three locations about the requirement..
